A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 'The force awakens' gave me a little prejudice before seeing this movie\, as to how simplified I felt «good vs evil» was portrayed in a clichè way. Watching 'The last Jedi' completely turned my impression around and left me in awe. It was a stunning movie\, with amazing characters and character development. The spiritual turmoil of The Force in this particular movie\, and complication of what is 'good' and 'bad' was used to truly open one's mind. I was also quite happy to see Yoda back in the movie\, with his mischievous character\, yet sharing true wisdome to the troubled Jedi\, Luke.
